channel.title: Website Posts on Liam's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Website Posts on Liam's Blog

item.title: Construction of this site
item.description: Building of this site The Liamkenneally.co.uk website is generated using a static website generator known as Hugo. The Hugo framework, plus many available themes created by developers allows for a quick and easy way to deploy a site/blog like the one you are currently viewing. I personally do not enjoy creating the front end of a website and I am quite frankly rubbish at it! So I grabbed a theme that would allow me to create a personal bio and provide a platform for me to create my blog posts.
